conversations.english: It's the latest and quite popular among young people.
conversations.chinese: 这是最新的产品，很受年轻人的欢迎。
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I know and I like it very much. I will take it.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我知道，我非常喜欢它，我买下了。

conversations.english: Hi, welcome to Hal's Computer World. Can I help you with anything?
conversations.chinese: 嗨，欢迎光临海尔计算机世界。我能为您效劳吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I'd like to buy a new computer, but I don't really know much about them. Can you give me any suggestions?
conversations.reply_chinese: 有的，我想买一台新电脑，但我对计算机所知不多。你可以给我一些建议吗？

conversations.english: Hey! I just bought one of those new Japanese cell phones! It's loaded with extras.
conversations.chinese: 嘿！我最近买了一部新款的日本手机！功能还挺多的。

conversations.english: Good morning, Madam！ Can I help you?
conversations.chinese: 早上好，女士！您要买什么？
conversations.reply_english: Well, I'd like to buy a watch.
Yes, I would like to buy a Walkman. Can you tell me about the models you have?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我想要买一台随身听。你能告诉我你有什么样不同的款式吗？

title: 我要购买照相机及其专业配件

conversations.english: Hello, ma’am, can I help you find something?
conversations.reply_english: Yes, actually I’m looking to buy a camera.
conversations.reply_chinese: 事实上我想买个照相机。

title: 这种音响有哪种质量保证

conversations.chinese: 有什么可以为您效劳的，先生？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, what sort of warranty comes with this stereo?
conversations.reply_chinese: 好的，这种音响有哪种质量保证？

conversations.english: Did you find everything ok today?
conversations.chinese: 今天你有看中什么东西吗？
conversations.reply_english: Yes, I did. By the way, in case there is a flaw in this CD player, can I return it?
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我有。顺便问一下，如果CD播放器有问题，我可以拿来退货吗？

title: 我手机中有许多杂音 Static

conversations.english: Repair service, how may I help you?
conversations.chinese: 维修服务，有什么我可以为您效劳的？
conversations.reply_english: My phone has got lot of static.

title: 送货有附加费用吗 Charge for delivery

conversations.english: I wish to order 100 sets of hifi.Do you have this service?
conversations.chinese: 我要订购一百套高保真,你们有没有这项服务。

conversations.english: Good morning, Angela, how have you been lately?
conversations.reply_english: Morning, Michael. I’ve been very busy lately. One of our other vendors is going out of business and I’ve been searching for a suitable replacement.
conversations.reply_chinese: 早，Michael。我最近非常忙，有一个推销员要不干了，我正忙于寻找合适的候选人。

title: 你买这个电视花了多少钱?

conversations.english: How much did you pay for the TV?
conversations.chinese: 你买这个电视花了多少钱？

conversations.reply_english: I'm looking for an MP-3 player. Which brand is of the highest quality?
conversations.reply_chinese: 我在找一个MP3播放器。哪个牌子的质量最好？

title: 我想要购买一部中等价位的手机

conversations.english: Hello sir, may I help you?
conversations.reply_english: Yeah, I accidentally dropped my phone in the toilet.
conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，我不小心将手机掉到马桶里了.

title: 我想退换这台坏了的音响

conversations.english: Hi, there’s a problem with this stereo. I’d like to return it, please.
conversations.chinese: 你好，这台音响有点问题。我想退货。

conversations.english: May I be of any assistance?
conversations.reply_english: I want to have a look at the microwave ovens.

title: 买这款迷你播放机怎么样?

conversations.reply_chinese: 是的，那款真的是物美价廉。

title: 买部手机给女儿做生日礼物

conversations.english: What can I do for you, Ma'am?
conversations.chinese: 女士，有什么能效劳的吗？
conversations.reply_english: I want to buy a cell phone for my daughter.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我想给我的女儿买一个手机。

conversations.reply_english: I need a phone card for this new cell phone.
conversations.reply_chinese: 我要为这部新手机买一张手机卡。
